original_title: 2009 New York Yankees: The Official World Series Film
overview: The New York Yankees Are Once Again World Series Champions!  The Yankees won their record 27th World Series Championship with a thrilling six game victory over the NL Champion Philadelphia Philles.  From Jeter to Rivera to A-Rod and C.C. its all here.
tagline: It was the matchup many had hoped for - the defending World Series champion Philadelphia Phillies against the team that had won more titles than any team in any sport: New York Yankees
title: 2009 New York Yankees: The Official World Series Film
